justification: The Offering ('The Ring is trying to get back to its master') and Interfaces ('The pirates buried their treasure in a secret location') do not mention simulation, digital twins, modelling, or training using simulated environments. There is no explicit or implied evidence addressing the ability described.
ability: The ability to create approximate imitation of a process or a system using past historical information, physical models, video, audio, and animation, what-if-scenarios.
